issues.description: Database username and password are passed directly as command-line arguments, exposing sensitive credentials in plain text and in process listings. This violates security best practices and increases the risk of credential leakage.
issues.recommendation: Store the database credentials in a Kubernetes Secret and reference them via environment variables or volume mounts. Remove them from args.

issues.description: No securityContext is defined for the container. Without constraints like runAsNonRoot, dropCapabilities, and readOnlyRootFilesystem, the container may run as root and have unnecessary privileges, increasing the attack surface.
issues.recommendation:
Add a securityContext to the container, for example:
securityContext:
  runAsNonRoot: true
  runAsUser: 1000
  allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
  readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
  capabilities:
    drop: ["ALL"]

issues.description: The image is referenced without a specific tag, defaulting to :latest. This can lead to unpredictable deployments if the image is updated upstream.
issues.recommendation: Specify an explicit, immutable image tag (for example, fiware/orion-ld:2.3.0) to ensure consistent, repeatable deployments.

issues.description: No imagePullPolicy is defined. By default, :latest images are pulled every time, which may slow down restarts.
issues.recommendation: Add imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent (or Always if you need always pull) to control when images are pulled.

issues.description: Probes lack timeoutSeconds and failureThreshold settings. Without timeouts, slow responses can cause pods to be marked unhealthy prematurely or hang indefinitely.
issues.recommendation: Define timeoutSeconds (e.g., 2) and failureThreshold (e.g., 3) for both livenessProbe and readinessProbe.

apiVersion: v1
kind: Secret
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld-db-secret
type: Opaque
stringData:
  DB_USER: "usuarioz√£o"
  DB_PWD: "123456789"
---
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: orionld
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: orionld
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: orion
        image: fiware/orion-ld:REPLACE_WITH_VERSION
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 1000
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          capabilities:
            drop: ["ALL"]
        args:
        - -dbhost
        - orionld-mongodb-svc:27017
        - -rplSet
        - orionld-mongodb
        - -dbuser
        - "$(DB_USER)"
        - -dbpwd
        - "$(DB_PWD)"
        - -dbAuthMech
        - SCRAM-SHA-256
        - -db
        - orion
        - -statCounters
        - -statSemWait
        - -statTiming
        - -statNotifQueue
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1026
        env:
        - name: ORIONLD_MONGOCONLY
          value: "TRUE"
        - name: DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: fiware-orionld-db-secret
              key: DB_USER
        - name: DB_PWD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              name: fiware-orionld-db-secret
              key: DB_PWD
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /version
            port: 1026
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
          failureThreshold: 3
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /version
            port: 1026
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 2
          failureThreshold: 3
---
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld-service
spec:
  type: LoadBalancer
  ports:
    - protocol: TCP
      port: 1027
      targetPort: 1026
  selector:
    app: orionld
---
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: fiware-orionld-hpa
spec:
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: fiware-orionld
  minReplicas: 3
  maxReplicas: 15
  metrics:
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 30
  - type: Resource
    resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        type: Utilization
        averageUtilization: 70
